skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: This is an official skill containing only static theme data and markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network operations, or filesystem access is present. Safe for publication.

content.user_title: Apply a professional theme to your artifact
content.value_statement: You need consistent visual styling across documents and presentations. This skill provides 10 curated themes and can generate custom themes based on your requirements. Apply matching colors and fonts to slides, docs, and reports.
actual_capabilities: Lists 10 preset themes with names, descriptions, and use cases
Provides complete color palettes with hex codes for each theme
Specifies header and body fonts per theme for typography consistency
Shows a visual theme showcase PDF for comparing options
Generates custom themes based on natural language descriptions
limitations: Does not automatically edit files without a host tool
Theme showcase is a static PDF that requires manual viewing
Font availability depends on the user environment and installed fonts
Themes are limited to the provided palettes and font pairings

use_cases.title: Brand consistent decks
use_cases.description: Select a theme and apply matching colors and fonts across pitch decks for consistent branding.

use_cases.title: Quick visual direction
use_cases.description: Compare theme options and choose a palette that fits a new landing page or design project.

use_cases.title: Polished client reports
use_cases.description: Apply a professional theme to client reports for consistent and polished delivery.

prompt_templates.title: Show available themes
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the theme showcase and list all available themes with brief descriptions of each.

prompt_templates.title: Apply preset theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my slide deck with its specified colors and fonts.

prompt_templates.title: Compare themes
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare Golden Hour and Modern Minimalist for a finance report and recommend the best option.

prompt_templates.title: Create custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for a wellness brand with calm colors and readable fonts, then show it for review.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my report.
output: Typography: Headers FreeSerif Bold, Body FreeSans

best_practices: Ask the user to view the theme showcase before making a selection
Confirm the selected theme name before applying it to ensure accuracy
Check contrast and readability after applying colors to verify accessibility
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without user confirmation or explicit selection
Ignoring the specified font pairings that complement each theme
Modifying the theme palette outside the defined hex colors

faq.question: Is this compatible with any document type?
faq.answer: It provides colors and fonts that can be applied to slides, docs, and reports in most editing tools.

faq.question: What are the limits of the preset themes?
faq.answer: There are 10 curated preset themes. Custom themes can be generated on request using natural language.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my tools?
faq.answer: It outputs color palettes and font specifications. Your editor or workflow applies them to artifacts.

faq.question: Does it store or send my data?
faq.answer: No. The skill contains only static theme definitions and operates locally without data transmission.

faq.question: What if the fonts are missing?
faq.answer: Install the listed fonts or substitute close alternatives with similar weight and style characteristics.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic theming?
faq.answer: It provides curated, professional color palettes with intentional font pairings and use case guidance.
